duties_responsibilities.duty: Serve a variety of client partners with a focus on the hospitality, tourism, healthcare, and nonprofit sectors.
Develop, manage and lead client partner relationships and programs.
Contribute thought leadership, raise professional profile and stay current with PR best practices.
Collaborate with a fun-loving team of professionals with opportunities to contribute to other industry and client partner needs.
Comfortable managing budgets, timelines and teams to meet or exceed client partner expectations.
Thrive in a multi-tasking environment, are curious and constantly learning, and demand the best of yourself no matter the task.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree or higher in Communication, Journalism or Marketing
